achievements.name: The Result of Previous Training
achievements.description: Complete Freeform Training in the Prologue.

achievements.name: Cleared for Field Duty
achievements.description: Complete The Final Test in the Prologue.

achievements.name: Seizing the Opportunity
achievements.description: Complete any Mission Story in The Final Test.

achievements.name: The Creative Assassin
achievements.description: Complete the Contract Creation Tutorial.

achievements.name: Silent Assassin
achievements.description: Complete The Final Test unspotted. Kill only Jasper Knight, ensuring his body is not found.

achievements.name: Security Defeated
achievements.description: Arrange matters so that a guard finds a discarded weapon and moves it into the hangar.

achievements.name: Chameleon
achievements.description: Change your disguise during The Final Test.

achievements.name: Training Escalated
achievements.description: Complete Level 5 of an Escalation Contract set in the ICA Facility.

achievements.name: Contract Assassin
achievements.description: Complete 10 Contracts.

achievements.name: Top of the Class
achievements.description: Set the high score on a Contract.

achievements.name: A New Profile
achievements.description: Complete a Featured Contract.

achievements.name: Tools of the Trade
achievements.description: Assassinate Targets with Ballistic, Accident and Explosion Kills.

achievements.name: Unseen Assassin
achievements.description: Assassinate a Target without getting spotted.

achievements.name: Infiltrator
achievements.description: Complete Nightcall.

achievements.name: Completionist

achievements.name: Strategic Disadvantage
achievements.description: Complete Nightcall on Master Difficulty.
